import React, { Component } from "react"; import Form from "../macroComponents/form/form"; import Joi from "joi-browser"; class AddItemCard extends Form { state = { formData: { selectCategory: "", itemName: "", addQuantityForItem: "", unitOfMeassure: "", }, }; schema = { selectCategory: Joi.string().required(), itemName: Joi.string().required(), addQuantityForItem: Joi.string().required(), unitOfMeassure: Joi.string().required(), }; render() { return (
{this.renderButton("Add More", this.handleSubmit)}
); } } export default AddItemCard;
